rss:
Education News\ A RSS feed containing the latest education related news from NASA.\ http://www.nasa.gov/\ \ en-us\ sandra.b.may@nasa.gov\ brian.dunbar@nasa.gov\
NASA\'92s Newest Astronauts Ready for Space Station, Moon, and Mars Missions\ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-s-newest-astronauts-ready-for-space-station-moon-and-mars-missions\ NASA welcomed 11 new astronauts to its ranks Friday, increasing the number of those eligible for spaceflight assignments that will expand humanity\'92s horizons in space for generations to come.\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-s-newest-astronauts-ready-for-space-station-moon-and-mars-missions\ Fri, 10 Jan 2020 10:30 EST\ Education News\ \
2020 FIRST Robotics Kickoff Event Returns to Rocket City Jan. 4\ http://www.nasa.gov/centers/marshall/news/releases/2020/M20-001.html\ More than 260 students are expected to attend the 2020 FIRST Robotics kickoff event Jan. 4, starting 8:30 a.m. at the U.S. Space & Rocket Center in Huntsville, Alabama.\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/centers/marshall/news/releases/2020/M20-001.html\ Thu, 02 Jan 2020 13:42 EST\ Education News\ \
NASA Selects Informal Learning Institutions to Engage Next Generation\ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-selects-informal-learning-institutions-to-engage-next-generation\ NASA\'92s Teams Engaging Affiliated Museums and Informal Institutions (TEAM II) program has selected four informal education organizations to promote STEM learning and help inspire the next generation of explorers.\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-selects-informal-learning-institutions-to-engage-next-generation\ Tue, 17 Dec 2019 16:27 EST\ Education News\ \
NASA Named Best Place to Work in Federal Government for 8th Straight Year\ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-named-best-place-to-work-in-federal-government-for-8th-straight-year\ For the eighth consecutive year, NASA has been selected by the Partnership for Public Service as the Best Place to Work in Government. The rankings, announced Tuesday, reflect NASA\'92s unified focus and dedication to sending humans farther into space than ever before, and the agency\'92s highest employee satisfaction results since this index was develop\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-named-best-place-to-work-in-federal-government-for-8th-straight-year\ Tue, 17 Dec 2019 15:44 EST\ Education News\ \
New NASA eBook Reveals Insights of Earth Seen at Night from Space\ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/new-nasa-ebook-reveals-insights-of-earth-seen-at-night-from-space\ Earth has many stories to tell, even in the dark of night. Earth at Night, NASA\'92s new 200-page ebook, is now available online and includes more than 150 images of our planet in darkness as captured from space by Earth-observing satellites and astronauts on the International Space Station over the past 25 years.\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/new-nasa-ebook-reveals-insights-of-earth-seen-at-night-from-space\ Tue, 10 Dec 2019 09:44 EST\ Education News\ \
New Mexico Students to Speak with NASA Astronaut Aboard Space Station\ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/new-mexico-students-to-speak-with-nasa-astronaut-aboard-space-station\ Students from New Mexico will have an opportunity next week to talk with a NASA astronaut currently living and working aboard the International Space Station.\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/new-mexico-students-to-speak-with-nasa-astronaut-aboard-space-station\ Fri, 06 Dec 2019 12:28 EST\ Education News\ \
Interns Express Themselves Through NASA Projects\ http://www.nasa.gov/feature/stem/interns-express-themselves-through-nasa-projects.html\ Interns Express Themselves Through NASA Projects\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/feature/stem/interns-express-themselves-through-nasa-projects.html\ Wed, 20 Nov 2019 08:58 EST\ Education News\ \
NASA, University of Alabama to Collaborate on Advanced, In-space Manufacturing\ http://www.nasa.gov/centers/marshall/news/news/releases/2019/19-032.html\ NASA\'92s Marshall Space Flight Center in Huntsville, Alabama, is expanding its partnership with the University of Alabama in Tuscaloosa, to collaborate on advanced and in-space manufacturing.\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/centers/marshall/news/news/releases/2019/19-032.html\ Fri, 08 Nov 2019 11:00 EST\ Education News\ \
NASA Selects Minority-Serving Institutions to Advance Aerospace Manufacturing\ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-selects-minority-serving-institutions-to-advance-aerospace-manufacturing\ The Minority University Research and Education Project (MUREP) of NASA\'92s Office of STEM Engagement is partnering with the agency\'92s Aeronautics Research Mission Directorate to provide students at minority-serving institutions the education and experience needed to help address manufacturing needs in the U.S. aerospace sector.\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-selects-minority-serving-institutions-to-advance-aerospace-manufacturing\ Wed, 30 Oct 2019 16:02 EDT\ Education News\ \
NASA Deputy Administrator, Astronaut Candidate to Visit University of North Carolina\ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-deputy-administrator-astronaut-candidate-to-visit-university-of-north-carolina\ NASA Deputy Administrator Jim Morhard and astronaut candidate Zena Cardman will visit the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill (UNC-Chapel Hill) Wednesday to Thursday, Nov. 6-7, to discuss the agency\'92s Artemis program.\ \ http://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-deputy-administrator-astronaut-candidate-to-visit-university-of-north-carolina\ Tue, 29 Oct 2019 15:55 EDT\ Education News\ \ \
